2.name: close
2.type: Closes an alert by removing it from the DOM. If the .fade and .show classes are present on the element, the alert will fade out before it is removed.

3.name: dispose
3.type: Destroys an element’s alert. (Removes stored data on the DOM element)

4.name: getInstance
4.type: Static method which allows you to get the alert instance associated to a DOM element. For example: bootstrap.Alert.getInstance(alert).

5.name: getOrCreateInstance
5.type: Static method which returns an alert instance associated to a DOM element or create a new one in case it wasn’t initialized. You can use it like this: bootstrap.Alert.getOrCreateInstance(element).
